name: tak-manager-root

scripts.update:changelog: git cliff --repository . --repository TAK-Wrapper --tag v${npm_package_version} --config cliff.toml --output CHANGELOG.md
scripts.wrapper:dev: cd TAK-Wrapper && poetry run python app.py --dev
scripts.package:mac: VERSION=$npm_package_version npm run image:mac --workspace=client && VERSION=$npm_package_version npm run package --workspace=TAK-Wrapper/web && create-dmg --dmg-title="TAK Manager $npm_package_version" 'TAK-Wrapper/dist/TAK Manager.app' TAK-Wrapper/dist/
scripts.package:win: set VERSION=%npm_package_version% && npm run image:win --workspace=client && npm run package --workspace=TAK-Wrapper/web && iscc TAK-Wrapper/inno-tak.iss
scripts.merge: git checkout main && git pull origin main && git merge dev && git push origin main && git checkout dev

author: Jacob Olsen
description: TAK Manager - A comprehensive TAK Server management solution
